message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
You're too generous, let's try for more!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect too much more!
You're not trying hard enough to give me the majority!
I'm trying to find a middle ground, meet me halfway!
You're getting closer, but I want more!
I'm getting closer to my target, but I'll give you a bit more
You're getting desperate, I can smell it!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll give you a bit more, but not much
You're running out of time, make a serious offer!
I'm making my final stand, take it or leave it
This is my last chance, take it or we both get nothing!
